request.description:
Should log request INFO level as default setting is set to write only that:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware": "Information"`

```
[12:07:59 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/ at 00:00:02.582 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=2583, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000003", RequestPath="/", SpanId="|4728c497-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c497-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

Should log request INFO level as default setting is set to write only that:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware": "Information"`

```
[12:08:41 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/undefined at 00:00:01.920 with 404 NotFound {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=404, Elapsed=1921, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/undefined", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000004", RequestPath="/undefined", SpanId="|4728c498-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c498-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

Should log request INFO level as default setting is set to write only that:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware": "Information"`

```
[12:10:16 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/client at 00:00:05.607 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Client} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=5608, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/client", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000005", RequestPath="/api/client", SpanId="|4728c499-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c499-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

But in same time this method calls `NamedHttpClient` and produces logs for it as configured:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.LoggingHandler.NamedHttpClient": "Verbose"`

Client request:

```
[12:22:31 VRB] POST http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2 HTTP/1.1

{"bar1":"bazz1","bar2":"bazz2"}
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.LoggingHandler.NamedHttpClient} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2", HttpMethod="POST", Uri=http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2, ActionId="6cbc0e30-b778-4f53-ae79-43050d31a2a3", ActionName="Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example.Controllers.ClientController.Index (Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example)", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000006", RequestPath="/api/client", SpanId="|4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0", Scope=["HTTP POST http://postman-echo.com/post?
oo1=bar1&foo2=bar2"]}

```

Client request response:

```
[12:22:36 VRB] HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 25 Aug 2022 09:22:06 GMT
Connection: keep-alive
ETag: W/"1cc-otEGAzXEzdBqgcK9PkwzRlKUCnc"
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Set-Cookie: sails.sid=s:VtlaLY***; Path=/; HttpOnly

{"args":{"foo1":"bar1","foo2":"bar2"},"data":{"bar1":"bazz1","bar2":"bazz2"},"files":{},"form":{},"headers":{"x-forwarded-proto":"http","x-forwarded-port":"80","host":"postman-echo.com","x-amzn-trace-id":"Root=1-63073f3e-634505be529e003c13badeb4","content-length":"31","request-id":"|4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149.1.","content-type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"},"json":{"bar1":"bazz1","bar2":"bazz2"},"url":"http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2"}
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.LoggingHandler.NamedHttpClient} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=261, Endpoint="http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2", HttpMethod="POST", Uri=http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2, ActionId="6cbc0e30-b778-4f53-ae79-43050d31a2a3", ActionName="Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example.Controllers.ClientController.Index (Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example)", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000006", RequestPath="/api/client", SpanId="|4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0", Scope=["HTTP POST http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2"]}

```

Trace details of client request:

```
[12:22:36 INF] POST http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2 at 00:00:00.261 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.LoggingHandler.NamedHttpClient} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=261, Endpoint="http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2", HttpMethod="POST", Uri=http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2, ActionId="6cbc0e30-b778-4f53-ae79-43050d31a2a3", ActionName="Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example.Controllers.ClientController.Index (Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example)", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000006", RequestPath="/api/client", SpanId="|4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49a-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0", Scope=["HTTP POST http://postman-echo.com/post?foo1=bar1&foo2=bar2"]}

```

Should log request all levels as this controller is configured to verbose logging:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test": "Verbose"`

The request:

```
[12:26:52 VRB] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test HTTP/1.1
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Host: localhost:5000
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.29.2
Postman-Token: 6aa1f041-4e91-4d75-8b8a-705a7e95b191

 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000008", RequestPath="/api/test", SpanId="|4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

The response:

```
[12:26:52 VRB] HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8

{"shouldAppear":true}
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=4, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000008",RequestPath="/api/test", SpanId="|4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

And trace details:

```
[12:26:52 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test at 00:00:00.003 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=4, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0:00000008", RequestPath="/api/test", SpanId="|4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149.", TraceId="4728c49c-47ed81f0e7b7b149", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6F3CLCVI0"}

```

In case of unexpected error in a controller, logs should be written:

Request:

```
[12:36:49 VRB] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/error HTTP/1.1
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Host: localhost:5000
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.29.2
Postman-Token: b1df9c82-0431-44b0-93b1-f765bf21dd5f
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3:00000002", RequestPath="/api/test/error", SpanId="|c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3"}

```

And response:

```
[12:36:49 VRB] HTTP/1.1 500 InternalServerError
Content-Type: text/html
System ERROR!
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=500, Elapsed=4, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error", HttpMethod="GET", ActionId="a3f8354d-abe8-48e4-967a-dbfd9f53a18f", ActionName="Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example.Controllers.TestController.Error (Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example)", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3:00000002", RequestPath="/api/test/error", SpanId="|c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3"}

```

And trace info:

```
[12:36:49 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/error at 00:00:00.004 with 500 InternalServerError {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=500, Elapsed=4,Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error", HttpMethod="GET", ActionId="a3f8354d-abe8-48e4-967a-dbfd9f53a18f", ActionName="Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example.Controllers.TestController.Error (Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.Core31.Example)", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3:00000002", RequestPath="/api/test/error", SpanId="|c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c319-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L3"}

```

In case of expected error where you have defined exception filter and provide custom response, it should be logged:

Request:

```
[12:41:11 VRB] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled HTTP/1.1
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Host: localhost:5000
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.29.2
Postman-Token: e0c96989-e6ef-4b0c-9ca4-19318e87ac8a

 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5:00000001", RequestPath="/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", SpanId="|c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5"}

```

Response:

```
[12:41:11 VRB] HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8

{"test":1}
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=401, Elapsed=10, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5:00000001", RequestPath="/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", SpanId="|c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5"}

```

And trace info:

```
[12:41:11 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled at 00:00:00.010 with 401 Unauthorized {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=401, Elapsed=10, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5:00000001", RequestPath="/api/test/error/ctrl-filter-handled", SpanId="|c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78.", TraceId="c9f2c31a-442b002cf7a02b78", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FKVMM0L5"}

```

Should not log anything as this request falls under endpoint exclude middleware:

`.AddRequestLoggingExclude("/api/test/silent-start*", "/api/test/silent")`

Should not log anything as this request falls under endpoint exclude middleware:

`.AddRequestLoggingExclude("/api/test/silent-start*", "/api/test/silent")`

Should not log anything as this request falls under endpoint exclude middleware:

`.AddRequestLoggingExclude("/api/test/silent-start*", "/api/test/silent")`

Should log as this request does not falls under endpoint exclude middleware:

`.AddRequestLoggingExclude("/api/test/silent-start*", "/api/test/silent")`

Request:

```
[12:50:51 VRB] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/silent/next HTTP/1.1
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: /
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Host: localhost:5000
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.29.2
Postman-Token: f16c117c-d186-4ca5-93af-c9c7b6da8166
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/silent/next", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA:00000009", RequestPath="/api/test/silent/next", SpanId="|88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA"}

```

Response:

```
[12:50:51 VRB] HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8

{"shouldAppear":true}
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=7, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/silent/next", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA:00000009", RequestPath="/api/test/silent/next", SpanId="|88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA"}

```

And trace info:

```
[12:50:51 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/test/silent/next at 00:00:00.006 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.Test} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=7, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/test/silent/next", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA:00000009", RequestPath="/api/test/silent/next", SpanId="|88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d4d-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JA"}

```

Should log request DEBUG level as default setting is set to write only that:

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestDebug": "Debug"`

EndFragment

In this level of logging, request and response body are not logged - only headers.

Request:

```
[12:53:50 DBG] GET http://localhost:5000/api/TestDebug HTTP/1.1
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Host: localhost:5000
User-Agent: PostmanRuntime/7.29.2
Postman-Token: b55c3db9-bcc7-41b6-bf4f-0c93c5e90f6c
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestDebug} {EventName="HttpRequest", Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/TestDebug", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC:00000004", RequestPath="/api/TestDebug", SpanId="|88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC"}

```

Response:

```
[12:53:50 DBG] HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 25 Aug 2022 09:53:50 GMT
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Server: Kestrel
 {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestDebug} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=7, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/TestDebug", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC:00000004", RequestPath="/api/TestDebug", SpanId="|88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC"}

```

And trace info:

```
[12:53:50 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/TestDebug at 00:00:00.006 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestDebug} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=7, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/TestDebug", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC:00000004", RequestPath="/api/TestDebug", SpanId="|88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d51-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JC"}

```

StartFragment

`"Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestInfo": "Information"`

EndFragment

```
[12:58:16 INF] GET http://localhost:5000/api/TestInfo at 00:00:00.001 with 200 OK {Crip.AspNetCore.Logging.RequestLoggingMiddleware.TestInfo} {EventName="HttpResponse", StatusCode=200, Elapsed=2, Endpoint="http://localhost:5000/api/TestInfo", HttpMethod="GET", RequestId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JE:00000001", RequestPath="/api/TestInfo", SpanId="|88045d52-4f1b7db632e7b4c3.", TraceId="88045d52-4f1b7db632e7b4c3", ParentId="", ConnectionId="0HMK6FQ5QH9JE"}
```
